# promise/avoid-new <Badge type="info" text="Restriction" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Disallow creating new promises outside of utility libs.

### Why is this bad?

If you dislike the new promise style promises.

### Example

```javascript
new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  /* ... */
});
```
